name: Law Firm Autopilot Podcast
what_you_do: The Law Firm Autopilot Podcast provides concrete advice for simplifying technology to streamline workflows, attract better clients, and gain more freedom for legal professionals.
who_you_serve: The podcast primarily serves solo and small firm attorneys looking for practical guidance in improving their practices.
